General introduction to my current research: [HTML](https://jhelvy.github.io/research-overview), [PDF](https://github.com/jhelvy/research-overview/blob/main/helveston-research.pdf?raw=true)

Slides for various talks:

```{r, echo=FALSE}

# NOTE: The slides.lua file is inserted as a filter in _quarto.yml to 
# avoid the insertion of a <colgroup> in the html around this table: 
# https://github.com/jgm/pandoc/issues/8139

library(knitr)
library(dplyr)
library(kableExtra)
library(glue)
library(tinytable)

root_url_slides <- 'https://jhelvy.github.io/'
root_url_pdf <- 'https://github.com/jhelvy/'
root_url_slides_old <- paste0(root_url_slides, 'slides-old/')
root_url_pdf_old <- paste0(root_url_pdf, 'slides-old/')

slides <- readr::read_csv(file.path('content', 'slides.csv')) %>%
    mutate(
      slides = ifelse(
        old == 1, 
        glue('[HTML]({root_url_slides_old}{repo})'),
        glue('[HTML]({root_url_slides}{repo})')
      ),
      pdf = ifelse(
        old == 1,
        glue('[PDF]({root_url_pdf_old}/blob/main/{repo}/{repo}.pdf?raw=true)'),
        glue('[PDF]({root_url_pdf}{repo}/blob/main/{repo}.pdf?raw=true)')
      )
    ) %>%
    select(-repo, -old) %>%
    janitor::clean_names(case = 'title') %>%
    rename(" " = Pdf)

slides |> 
  tt(theme = "grid", width = c(0.3, 0.8, 0.8, 0.5, 0.1, 0.1)) |>
  style_tt(fontsize = 1) |> 
  format_tt(quarto = TRUE)
```
